title: Cough syrup row: Owner of pharma company that supplied 'poisonous' Coldrif arrested
content: G Ranganathan, owner of Sresan Pharmaceuticals, has been arrested by a Madhya Pradesh team in connection with the toxic Coldrif cough syrup linked to 21 deaths. Ranganathan, a veteran in the pharmaceutical industry known for his nutritional syrup Pronit, faces scrutiny as his manufacturing unit has been sealed and his office cleared out.

title: ‘Great day’: Trump announces Israel-Hamas 'sign off' on first stage of US-brokered deal
content: President Trump announced Israel and Hamas have signed off on the first phase of a US-brokered peace plan, aiming for the release of all hostages and an Israeli troop withdrawal. This historic agreement, following intense negotiations, marks initial steps toward a durable peace in the Middle East.

title: Trade war: White House drops generic drug tariffs; eases pain for US patients & Indian pharma
content: The Trump administration has abandoned plans for tariffs on imported generic drugs, a move bringing significant relief to Indian pharmaceutical companies. This decision averts potential price hikes and shortages for millions of Americans relying on affordable Indian generics for various health conditions, highlighting India's crucial role as the largest supplier of these essential medicines to the US.

title: 'Prove you're serious!' - Ashwin tells Rohit, Virat to play domestic cricket
content: Ravichandran Ashwin backs the BCCI's decisions regarding Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's ODI futures, emphasising long-term planning for the 2027 World Cup. He suggests domestic tournaments like the Vijay Hazare Trophy are crucial for the veterans to prove their commitment and form, while also endorsing Shubman Gill's captaincy for future leadership grooming.

title: Kanpur blast: 8 injured after scooter carrying firecrackers explodes
content: A powerful firecracker blast in Kanpur's Meston Road market injured eight people, with four in critical condition and airlifted to Lucknow. The explosion, originating from a scooter, damaged vehicles and several shops, causing panic. Authorities are investigating all angles, with forensic and anti-sabotage teams examining the scene.

title: Trade war heats up: US targets Chinese tech firms; Beijing vows ‘necessary measures’
content: The Trump administration has expanded export restrictions to include subsidiaries of Chinese tech companies on the entity list, aiming to close loopholes. This move targets firms like Huawei and DJI, impacting tens of thousands of entities and drawing sharp condemnation from Beijing as US-China tech tensions escalate.

title: IPS officer 'suicide': Wife names Hry DGP in complaint; claims husband faced harassment
content: Wife of deceased IPS officer Y Puran Kumar, IAS officer Amneet P Kumar, has lodged a complaint seeking FIR against Haryana DGP Shatrujeet Singh Kapur and Rohtak SP Narendra Bijarnia for abetment to suicide and SC/ST Act violations. She alleges her husband faced systematic persecution and humiliation due to his caste, pushing him to suicide.

title: Op Sindoor showed how air power can swiftly shape outcomes: IAF chief
content: IAF chief Air Chief Marshal A P Singh highlighted the "bold and precise" attacks during Operation Sindoor as a demonstration of air power's effectiveness in shaping military outcomes. The deep precision strikes, conducted from May 7 to 10, restored offensive air action's importance and showcased the force's ability to strike deep inside enemy territory with precision.

title: India's ODI captain: 'Stop the memes' - Mohd Shami on Gill replacing Rohit
content: Veteran pacer Mohammed Shami has backed Shubman Gill's ODI captaincy, urging fans to cease online criticism and memes. Shami emphasized that the decision by the BCCI and selectors is strategic, citing Gill's prior captaincy experience. He reminded supporters that leadership changes are natural in cricket and urged them to support the new captain as he embarks on this new chapter.

title: Ford’s RTO chaos: HR admits “failure”; staff face threats
content: Ford's HR director admitted the automaker failed to properly manage return-to-office email communications, leading to compliant employees receiving termination warnings due to system errors. This follows a rocky policy rollout requiring employees on-site four days a week, with issues like parking shortages and desk availability also reported.

title: 'Reset & repair ties with India': US lawmakers write to Trump over tariffs
content: Twenty-one US lawmakers urged President Trump to reset ties with India, warning his punitive tariffs are harming both nations and pushing New Delhi towards rivals like China and Russia. The letter highlighted the strategic importance of India in the Indo-Pacific and the economic damage caused by the tariffs to American consumers and businesses.

title: CeeDee Lamb injury update: Rehab progress hints at early Cowboys comeback
content: Dallas Cowboys' star wide receiver CeeDee Lamb is showing positive signs in his recovery from a high-ankle sprain.  Having missed two games, Lamb was seen doing rehab work, marking a significant step.  Owner Stephen Jones indicated Lamb is among several players who could return within two weeks, potentially bolstering the team's playoff hopes.

title: ‘Full implementation’: Hamas confirms Gaza ceasefire, hostage exchange deal with Israel
content: Hamas announced a hostage-ceasefire deal with Israel. The agreement includes exchanging hostages for Palestinian prisoners. This breakthrough follows indirect talks in Egypt. The deal aims to end the war in Gaza and withdraw Israeli forces. Humanitarian aid will enter the region. Donald Trump confirmed the agreement, calling it a historic event. Further discussions are expected.

title: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos: I always advise to young people, 'Go work at ...'
content: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos advises young aspiring entrepreneurs to gain foundational experience by working at McDonald's. He emphasizes that such roles teach crucial skills like responsibility, discipline, and customer interaction, which are vital for long-term success and often overlooked in the pursuit of rapid startup growth.

title: Ravindra Jadeja misses R Ashwin; spin legend gives witty reply - 'Jitna faayda hai ...'
content: Ravichandran Ashwin's absence in India's Test win over West Indies sparked a touching exchange with Ravindra Jadeja. While Jadeja admitted missing his spin partner, Ashwin playfully urged him to capitalize on the opportunity, highlighting Jadeja's growing legend. Ashwin also noted the changing dynamics of the young Indian squad, reflecting on the camaraderie lost with senior players' departures.

title: Cough syrup tragedy: Death toll mounts to 21; CM Yadav admits lapses
content: Tragedy strikes as cough syrup deaths climb to 21 across Madhya Pradesh, with new fatalities in Betul and Pandhurna. Chief Minister Mohan Yadav admitted to systemic lapses, vowing to improve coordination. The poisonous diethylene glycol in Coldrif syrup is blamed for renal failure. Meanwhile, a one-year-old boy recovered, offering a glimmer of hope amidst the ongoing investigation into the manufacturer.

title: 'No credible evidence': SC acquits man on death row for girl's rape-murder
content: The Supreme Court overturned the death sentence of a man convicted of rape and murder, stating the police made him a scapegoat. The court found the prosecution failed to prove the case beyond a reasonable doubt, highlighting a lack of credible evidence and questioning the authenticity of CCTV footage.

title: Weight loss jabs may distort cancer scans, raising risks of misdiagnosis
content: New research suggests weight loss jabs like GLP-1s could affect cancer scans. These drugs might make scans appear abnormal, leading to unnecessary tests. Experts also found these jabs could reduce the effectiveness of breast cancer chemotherapy. Doctors now emphasize reviewing patient history before treatments. More studies are needed on these drugs' impact. Read below to know more about this!

title: BCCI using 'Team India' name: Delhi HC dismisses PIL; calls it 'sheer wastage of time’
content: The Delhi High Court dismissed a PIL questioning the BCCI's right to call its players the 'Indian cricket team'. Judges deemed the plea a 'sheer wastage' of judicial time, emphasising that the team unequivocally represents India in international sports, regardless of the BCCI's private status. The court found no violation of emblem or flag laws.

title: Bradford Freeman net worth: How rich is the man behind Stanford’s $50m donation?
content: Stanford football received a historic $50 million donation from alumnus Bradford M. Freeman, the largest individual gift not tied to facilities. This transformative contribution will fund five new scholarships and bolster the university's NIL infrastructure. Freeman's generosity aims to usher in a new era of excellence and competitiveness for the Cardinal program.

title: Arturo Gatti Jr cause of death: How did the boxing legend’s son die at 17?
content: Arturo Gatti Jr, the 17-year-old son of boxing legend Arturo Gatti, has died in Mexico. He was found in an apartment where he lived with his mother. His death has shocked the boxing world. Gatti Jr. was training to follow his father's boxing career. This tragedy occurs nearly 16 years after his father's mysterious death in Brazil.

title: ‘No idea’: Trump says might not win Nobel peace prize despite ending 'many' wars
content: Donald Trump is unsure about winning the Nobel Peace Prize. He stated his administration resolved seven wars and is close to settling an eighth. Trump believes he deserves the award for his peace efforts. The Nobel Peace Prize announcement is scheduled for Friday. Trump was previously nominated but did not win.

title: Tom Brady’s ex Gisele Bundchen’s NYC townhouse hits market for $17M
content: Gisele Bundchen's former New York City home is now for sale. The elegant townhouse in Manhattan's West Village is listed at $16.995 million. Bundchen owned the property about 20 years ago. The historic home offers refined living space and modern amenities. This property represents a piece of supermodel history in a sought-after neighborhood.

title: New federal agency to oversee India’s transport sector; end silos in planning
content: India is establishing its first apex federal agency, GTPRO, within the cabinet secretariat to plan and monitor the entire transport sector. This move aims to break down silos in infrastructure planning and improve coordination among ministries and states, drawing inspiration from international models. A Group of Transport Experts will provide technical support for long-term planning.

title: Ladakh unrest: Leh Bar seeks Rs 1 cr each for firing victims; demands judicial probe
content: The Leh Bar Association has demanded Rs 1 crore compensation for each family of the four killed in the September 24 firing and an impartial judicial inquiry headed by a retired Supreme Court judge.

title: Ayesha Curry’s reaction to shirtless man sparks outrage; fans warn Stephen Curry
content: NBA star Stephen Curry and wife Ayesha are facing backlash after a resurfaced video showed her playfully gesturing to remove her wedding ring upon seeing a shirtless man. Fans are interpreting this and past comments as signs of marital trouble, with some even suggesting divorce. Neither Stephen nor Ayesha has commented on the criticism.

title: Coldrif row: MP took 2 weeks to raise red flag on cough syrup deaths
content: Children's deaths in MP due to renal failure were initially reported in September, with authorities taking action after Nagpur hospitals alerted them. Biopsy reports confirmed acute tubular injury, leading to the identification of substandard cough syrups, including Coldrif, containing toxic diethylene glycol, prompting a state-wide ban.

title: J&K: Army launches massive search operation to trace 2 missing soldiers
content: Two soldiers have gone missing in a forested area of south Kashmir's Anantnag district after encountering a severe snowstorm. An intense search and rescue operation, supported by choppers, is underway but hampered by adverse weather conditions. Officials believe the soldiers may be unable to communicate due to the inclement weather.

title: Supreme Court nixes govt's plea for norms to make sentences victim-centric
content: The Supreme Court rejected the government's plea for victim-centric sentencing guidelines, particularly for death penalty cases. The Centre had sought to prioritise victims and society over accused-centric considerations and introduce strict timelines for appeals and mercy petitions. The court found the plea without merit, upholding existing judicial precedents.

title: Stephen Curry injury update: Will Warriors star play vs Trail Blazers tonight?
content: Stephen Curry is set to play tonight against the Portland Trail Blazers, confirmed by coach Steve Kerr. After a strong preseason opener, Curry, fully recovered from a hamstring injury, will see his minutes gradually increase. His participation signals the Warriors' focus on building veteran chemistry and rhythm for the upcoming 2025-26 NBA season.

title: UK PM Keir Starmer sidesteps query on India's import of Russian oil
content: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer arrived in India for a major trade mission, emphasizing business-to-business engagement and investment over visa relaxations for Indian workers and students. He stated that visas played no part in the recent trade deal and confirmed the UK's focus on attracting global top talent to boost its economy.

title: Cardi B breaks silence amid Stefon Diggs’ new lawsuit from ex Mulan Hernandez
content: Amidst a paternity dispute and sexual assault allegations, NFL star Stefon Diggs faces a lawsuit from ex-girlfriend Mulan Hernandez, who claims he assaulted her and pressured her to sign an NDA. Diggs had previously accused Hernandez and a friend of extortion and assault. Cardi B, Diggs' pregnant partner, posted a cryptic "Am I the Drama?" message.

title: J&K: Omar govt failed to protect land & dignity of people, alleges Mehbooba
content: PDP chief Mehbooba Mufti has slammed Chief Minister Omar Abdullah for inaction on land lease rules, risking eviction for hotels and institutions. She announced her party's 'Anti-bulldozer Bill' to regularize land holdings of those in possession for over 30 years. Meanwhile, BJP leader Sunil Sharma questioned the CM's focus on statehood.

title: Controversy! Indian water polo team face scrutiny; here's why
content: India's men's water polo team sparked controversy at the Asian Aquatics Championships by displaying the national flag on their swimming trunks, violating the Flag Code of India. Officials have sought a report, and the Swimming Federation of India has assured the flag will be moved to skull caps in future matches.

title: Bihar polls: CM face confusion in MGB, seat chaos in NDA - decoding political drama
content: Bihar's upcoming assembly elections are marked by poetic negotiations and power plays within alliances. Jitan Ram Manjhi invokes poetry for fair seat-sharing in NDA, while Left allies in Mahagathbandhan reject 'insulting' proposals. The absence of a clear chief ministerial face and leadership confusion are key issues.

title: IndiGo to launch Del-Manchester service; Mum-Manchester flights set to increase
content: IndiGo is launching daily flights between New Delhi and Manchester, adding to its existing Mumbai route. This expansion, announced during a UK trade mission, will result in nine direct flights weekly between Manchester and India. The new services are projected to boost exports, tourism, and job creation.

title: New proxy war? Pak's ISI forges LeT-ISKP alliance; what it means for India's security
content: Lashkar-e-Taiba and ISKP have reportedly formed a covert alliance in Balochistan. This partnership is allegedly engineered and funded by Pakistan's ISI. The groups aim to target Baloch people. There is a possibility of expansion to Jammu and Kashmir. Visual evidence shows commanders training together. This alliance follows India's counterterror actions.

title: Infinity walk: How figure-8 walking boosts brain function and balance
content: A simple walking technique, the Infinity Walk, is gaining attention for its profound impact on the brain and nervous system. This figure-8 pattern walk synchronizes brain hemispheres, sharpens focus, and improves balance. It also engages core muscles, aiding posture. Studies suggest it can calm the nervous system and reduce stress.

title: J&K: Security forces conduct search ops in Rajouri, Udhampur to track terrorists
content: Security forces launched extensive search operations in Rajouri and Udhampur districts of Jammu and Kashmir on Wednesday following a brief firefight with terrorists in Rajouri's Kandi area. Troops are combing remote, forested regions and checking vehicles to track down the militants. A separate operation is underway in Udhampur after locals reported suspicious movements.

title: Bihar polls: Smaller NDA allies flex muscle; will BJP, JD(U) fight on fewer seats?
content: Bihar's ruling NDA faces seat-sharing hurdles as smaller allies, including LJP (RV) and HAM, escalate their demands. The BJP and JD(U) are reportedly set to contest fewer seats than in 2020 to accommodate these requests. The alliance is working towards finalizing strategies and candidates ahead of the upcoming assembly elections.

title: 'Agarkar will lose the fight': Kohli decision sparks debate; Harmison slams IND selector
content: Shubman Gill's appointment as India's ODI captain for the upcoming Australia series fuels speculation about Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's future. Former England pacer Steve Harmison believes chief selector Ajit Agarkar's stance on domestic cricket participation could lead to a "messy end" for the veterans, particularly highlighting Kohli's crucial role.

title: J&K: Sikh man held for ‘sacrilegious act’ in Samba; FIR registered
content: Samba district police apprehended Manjit Singh, a Sikh man, for allegedly desecrating the Guru Granth Sahib at a local gurdwara. The incident, involving the setting ablaze of the holy text with inflammable oil, has ignited widespread protests from the Sikh community. Authorities have registered an FIR and are urging cooperation to quell rumors.

title: SBI looking to ease KYC burden: Chairman C S Setty
content: SBI is collaborating with regulators to simplify its Know Your Customer (KYC) processes, aiming to enhance customer convenience and reduce compliance burdens. This initiative addresses customer complaints about frequent re-KYC requirements, particularly with public sector banks. The bank is also leveraging digital and physical touchpoints to ensure accessible financial services across India.

title: Arturo Gatti Jr, son of boxing legend, found dead at 17 in Mexico apartment
content: Tragedy strikes the Gatti family again as Arturo Gatti Jr., 17, was found dead in Mexico. His passing, 16 years after his boxing legend father's mysterious death in Brazil, has deeply saddened the sports world. Friends and fellow fighters mourn the loss of the promising young boxer, whose life ended under similarly shocking circumstances.

title: "Peace President" Trump Weighs His Prospect Of Winning Nobel Prize
content: While the White House pegged him as 'The Peace President', Donald Trump himself seemed sceptical about his prospects of winning the Nobel Peace Prize despite his claim of settling 'seven' global conflicts.

title: "Build For Inclusion": RBI Governor Urges Fintechs To Focus On Underserved Sections
content: Reserve Bank Governor Sanjay Malhotra on Wednesday exhorted the fledgling fintech ecosystem to focus on the underserved sections of the society to deepen financial inclusion.

title: Delhi Police To Launch Specialised Unit To Tackle Organised Crime Networks
content: The Delhi Police is gearing up to launch a specialised unit under the Maharashtra Control of Organised Crime Act (MCOCA) to tighten the noose around gangsters and organised crime networks in the national capital.

title: 'Bibi, You Have No Choice': How Trump's Pressure On Netanyahu Sealed Gaza Deal
content: US President Donald Trump told the Axios news outlet that he had said to Benjamin Netanyahu: "'Bibi, this is your chance for victory.' He was fine with it. He's got to be fine with it. He has no choice. With me, you got to be fine."

title: "Great Efforts Of Great Friend": Netanyahu Lauds Trump Over Gaza Peace Deal
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Thursday thanked US President Donald Trump for "his leadership, partnership, and unwavering commitment" as Israel and Hamas agreed to the first phase of the Gaza peace plan.

title: "Great Day For World", Says Trump After Israel, Hamas Agree To Gaza Deal
content: U.S. President Donald Trump told Reuters on Wednesday that a Gaza hostages-for-ceasefire deal hammered out in Egypt represented "a great day for the world."

title: Oil Prices Fall As Israel, Hamas Agree To Gaza Peace Deal
content: Oil prices fell in early trade on Thursday after Israel and Hamas agreed to the first phase of a plan to end the war in Gaza, weighing on oil's war risk premium and pushing investors to sell.

title: Speeding Porsche Crashes Into Divider On Mumbai Expressway, Driver Injured
content: A high-speed Porsche car collided with a divider on Mumbai's Western Express Highway late last night, leaving the vehicle badly damaged and its driver seriously injured.

title: Jane Goodall's Final Wish: Blast Trump, Musk And Putin To Space
content: In a Netflix interview aired posthumously, Jane Goodall, who died last week at 91, said she'd gladly send Donald Trump, Elon Musk, Vladimir Putin, Xi Jinping and Benjamin Netanyahu off the planet in a SpaceX rocket.

title: Trump Says Israel, Hamas Agree To First Phase Of Gaza Peace Plan
content: Israel and Hamas have agreed to the "first phase" of his peace plan to pause fighting and release at least some hostages and prisoners, U.S. President Donald Trump said Wednesday.

title: Spy Case Collapse Sparks Allegations Of UK PM Appeasing China
content: The trial of two men accused of spying for China was scheduled to begin this week in London. But prosecutors unexpectedly dropped the case last month, The New York Times reported.

title: Trump Administration Fires US Diplomat Over Romance With Chinese Woman
content: US President Donald Trump's administration said Wednesday it fired a State Department employee who did not acknowledge a romantic relationship with a Chinese national.

title: Hamas Says Deal Reached To End Gaza War, Urges Israel To Implement It
content: Hamas said on Thursday it had reached an agreement to end the war in Gaza following talks on a proposal by U.S. President Donald Trump, saying the deal includes an Israeli withdrawal from the enclave and a hostage-prisoner exchange.

title: Netanyahu Says Will Bring Hostages Home "With God's Help"
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Thursday said Israel would bring home all the hostages held by Hamas in Gaza, after US President Donald Trump and mediators reported a deal to end the Gaza war.

title: Multiple FIRs Filed In Punjab Over Social Media Posts Against Chief Justice
content: In a firm crackdown on objectionable and unlawful social media content, the Punjab Police have registered multiple FIRs across several districts after receiving numerous complaints regarding posts and videos targeting Chief Justice of India BR Gavai.

title: Best Proposal "On The Table": Russia's Lavrov Praises Trump's Gaza Plan
content: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov, in an interview published on Wednesday, said U.S. President Donald Trump's plan for peace in Gaza may be general in approach, but remains the best proposal "on the table" for now.

title: Trump Says He May Travel To Middle East This Weekend For Gaza Deal
content: -President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he may travel to the Middle East this weekend as his negotiators seek to seal a Gaza hostages-for-ceasefire deal.

title: Outgoing French PM Says New Premier To Be Named In Next 48 Hours
content: Outgoing French Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu, who intensified a political crisis by resigning earlier this week, said Wednesday he expected President Emmanuel Macron to name a new premier within the next 48 hours.

title: Wife Of Officer Who Died By Suicide Files Abetment Complaint Against Haryana Top Cop
content: The wife of the Haryana IPS officer who died by suicide has filed a police complaint against the Director General of Police, state's highest-ranking police officer, and a senior cop for subjecting her husband to "caste-based slurs".

title: PM Uses P Chidambaram's Remarks As Ammo, Attacks Congress On 26/11 Response
content: Training his guns on the Congress, using former Union minister P Chidambaram's remarks as ammunition, PM Narendra Modi has said the opposition party had succumbed to international pressure in deciding not take military against Pakistan.

title: Jays knock out Yankees, reach 1st ALCS since '16
content: The Blue Jays advanced to the club's first ALCS since 2016 after defeating the Yankees 5-2 on Wednesday.

title: UNC backs Belichick as talk swirls amid 2-3 start
content: Amid a chaotic week, North Carolina and head coach Bill Belichick released a joint statement Wednesday night, with the Tar Heels saying he has "the full support" of the UNC administration.

title: Cubs use 4-run 1st inning to keep season alive
content: The Cubs avoided a sweep by holding off the Brewers in Game 3 of their NL Division Series on Wednesday.

title: Báez leads Tigers breakout; Skubal on tap for G5
content: Led by Javier Báez, the Tigers offense broke out in a big way Wednesday to even the ALDS and force a deciding Game 5 on Friday at Seattle, where Detroit will have reigning AL Cy Young winner Tarik Skubal on the mound.

title: Giannis: Devoted to Bucks; 'human' if it changes
content: Giannis Antetokounmpo reiterated his commitment to the Bucks on Wednesday but said it would be "human to change his mind" down the line.

title: Perception of Mayfield shifting amid MVP-type run
content: Baker Mayfield has seen the perception himself change dramatically from the time he was a first overall draft pick with the Browns to being what some have described as an MVP candidate in his third year with the Buccaneers.

title: 'Fail Mary' backlash still hurts Bears' Stevenson
content: Bears cornerback Tyrique Stevenson says the backlash he received for his role in tipping a Hail Mary pass against the Commanders last season "still hurts."

title: 49ers' Purdy still not practicing; IR move not likely
content: Brock Purdy still isn't practicing due to a toe injury that has forced him to miss three games, but the 49ers aren't ready to consider putting him on injured reserve.

title: 😡 Bottom 10: Not-So-Happy Valley these days
content: Another loss by Penn State put the Nittany Lions -- and the Bottom 10 committee -- in a bit of a predicament.

title: Wyshynski predicts every NHL team's finish in 2025-26
content: As the season begins, we reveal which teams will make the Stanley Cup Final, the playoffs and the draft lottery.

title: 'I have not been back yet': Why Georgia fans haven't forgiven Auburn 39 years later
content: In 1986, Auburn sprayed hoses at Bulldogs fans, including current QB Gunner Stockton's grandfather, and they haven't forgotten it.

title: The latest buzz around the NFL: Insiders on Geno Smith, Daniel Jones and extensions on the horizon
content: Are the Raiders worried about Smith? Can Jones keep rolling? Which players could get extended soon? And which coordinators might get head coaching interest?

title: He could go all the ... what?!? 7 times an NFL player dropped the ball short of the end zone
content: Emari Demercado, Adonai Mitchell and Jonathan Taylor will share the field Sunday and a bond they'd rather forget.

title: Kung Fu, meditation and a 'Dream Shake': Inside Victor Wembanyama's return
content: A 'traumatic experience' with deep vein thrombosis prompted a summer of exploration for the Spurs star.

title: Stephanie 'La Primera' Vaquer's WWE career marked by historic firsts
content: Stephanie Vaquer shares her path to WWE, and how a memorable night in Indianapolis helped her fulfill "the dream of my life."

title: Eli Manning in 'Chad Powers' reminds us to believe
content: Eli Manning, a two-time Super Bowl MVP and NFL legend, on "Chad Powers" and the possibility of second chances.

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in, who's out, who has work to do in each league﻿
content: Putting the spotlight on select teams and questions around others as the early playoff picture takes shape.

title: Win projections for all 30 NBA teams: How we see the East, West playing out
content: ESPN NBA analyst Kevin Pelton unveils his annual win projections for all 30 teams. Where does your team land?

title: Giannis Antetokounmpo has finally put the Milwaukee Bucks on the clock
content: In a transformative summer for the Bucks, the team had discussions about moving the two-time MVP to New York.

title: UWCL talking points: Does Melchie Dumornay's demolition of Arsenal make her world-class?
content: Emily Keogh, Julien Laurens and Sam Marsden answer some of our burning questions after the first round of the UEFA Women's Champions League.

title: A dream Champions League debut for Le Tissier and Man United
content: Bigger tests will come, but for now Maya Le Tissier & Co., will revel in Manchester United's perfect start.

title: Leicester's Premier League win, 10 years later: How did they do it, and could a team repeat it?
content: Leicester's stunning title win remains one of the great underdog stories in sports. What do the players who made it happen think of their achievement today? And will we ever see a team match their feat?

title: Facts vs. Feelings: Patience is a virtue. Until it isn't
content: If your team isn't winning, shake things up. These seven players might offer sneaky start or trade value.

title: Matchup rankings: Matthew Stafford, Jacory Croskey-Merritt stand out in Week 6
content: Matchups are the key to lineup decisions. Here are the most and least favorable at QB, RB, WR and TE.

title: Survivor pool strategy: Packers, Broncos among top options in Week 6
content: NFL survivor pool strategy, predictions and picks for ESPN Eliminator Challenge Week 6, including teams to pick or save for later.

title: Latest rosters for 90+ teams: Transfers, recruits and more
content: Players leaving. Players joining. We're updating key rosters as players arrive on campus for the 2025-26 season.

title: 11 freshmen with the most impact -- including three from Stanford
content: Why Jazzy Davidson could make the biggest impact -- and all three Stanford recruits make these preseason rankings.

title: 'Beyond repair': Napheesa Collier, Cathy Engelbert and a WNBA teetering on the brink
content: Amid the WNBA Finals, two of the most powerful people in the game are locked in a contentious battle -- for public opinion, power and money.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool linked with move for Semenyo
content: Liverpool are reportedly looking to sign Bournemouth winger Antoine Semenyo. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: MotoGP in pictures: Two-wheeled F1 is intoxicatingly raw, full of skill, sacrifice and scars
content: MotoGP, the two-wheeled equivalent of F1, opened its doors to ESPN cameras, revealing a sport that blends exceptional talent with astonishing bravery.

title: Tough task: Gor, Kapur take charge of India portfolio amid tense ties - challenges ahead
content: Rajghatta is author of Kamala Harris: Phenomenal Woman Karwa Chauth 2025: Bollywood divas approved lehenga looks for the festival Shakha Pola designs for Bengali women 10 beetroot benefits and kidney-safe ways to eat it Aishwarya Rai Bachchan’s most iconic dance looks through the years Rashmika Madanna stuns with her ethnic elegance The influence of moon on hair growth: Myth or magic? 7 easy livebearing freshwater fish for beginners: Perfect for home aquariums The rainbow of the wild: 10 colourful and rare insects across the globe From Neeru Bajwa to Shehnaaz Gill: Leading ladies shaping Punjabi cinema’s bright future In pics: Vijay Sethupathi’s fierce avatar in Bigg Boss Tamil 9 promo

title: WWE Crown Jewel: Key stats and info to know before Saturday's premium live event
content: the premium live event (PLE) will be headlined by a pair of matches for the men's and women's crown jewel championships . undisputed WWE champion Cody Rhodes will challenge world heavyweight champion seth Rollins in one match .

title: Dowdle, Simmons lead Team of the Week 5 in Madden NFL 26
content: totw5's top spots went to Carolina Panthers running back Rico Dowdle and Tennessee Titans defensive tackle Jeffery Simmons . the 90 OVR Limited Edition cards are inspired by the previous week's best real-world performances .

title: Joel Embiid and four other big-name players to avoid in drafts
content: Joel Embiid has averaged just 50 games played over nine seasons . he's reached 60 games just four times last season . the 76ers are a dominant fantasy player when healthy . here are five big names to avoid in your drafts .

title: MMA pound-for-pound rankings: Where do Merab, Pereira land in the top 10?
content: merab Dvalishvili wins bantamweight title by unanimous decision over Cory Sandhagen . the pair put on spectacular performances in the two championship fights at UFC 320 . pereira knocked down Magomed Ankalaev in the main event's opening minute .

title: NFL Power Rankings: Big jumps for Colts and 49ers? How far did the Chargers fall?
content: the Eagles and the Bills suffered one-score losses to the Broncos and Patriots respectively . the Jets are the only winless team after getting trounced by the Cowboys . in addition to our 1-32 rankings, our NFL Nation reporters are looking at every team's fantasy football surprise .

title: What's up with Manning? Coaches who have faced him and worked with him weigh in
content: a third-year player has been taunted and clapped back . the quarterback has been booed by road and home fans alike . he has also brought snippets of joy to those wearing Burnt Orange .

title: Natalia Bryant credited as creative director for Lakers' preseason hype video
content: the los Angeles lakers turned to a familiar face to be the creative director of their preseason hype video . Natalia Bryant had a star-studded cast for the "Forever Iconic: Purple and Gold Always" video with los Angeles Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani . actor and noted lakers fan Brenda Song also made an appearance .

title: Leicester's 2015-16 Premier League champions: Where are they now?
content: the odds are stacked against any club hoping to repeat Leicester City's unlikely premier league title win . a decade ago, the Foxes were about to become the most improbable title winners of all time . from stars Jamie Vardy and Riyad Mahrez to role players such as Shinji Okazaki and Jeffrey Schlupp, each of that team's key contributors is today .

title: The 2000 Sooners and 19 other unlikely champions
content: the Longhorns are two possessions away from being undefeated and harps on limiting their balanced attack of arch Manning and Quintrevion Wisner . the Sooners had gone just 44-45-3 over the previous eight seasons, handcuffed first by NCAA sanctions and then by two poor head coaching hires . but second-year head coach Bob Stoops led them to a decent 7-5 campaign in 1999, and with quarterback Josh Heupel slinging the ball around more than 35 times

title: Reevaluating bold predictions for all 32 teams: What has been right, wrong?
content: in the preseason, I made one bold prediction for every team . it's easy to make a prediction, but we also need to check in on them . the predictions game is seeing how our forecasts fare .

title: Are workers’ rights being eroded? | Explained
content: What happened at the Sigachi Industries chemical factory in Telangana when a chemical reactor burst? What has the International Labour Organization (ILO) said about industrial accidents? What laws are in place in India that protect workers’ rights?

title: What was behind the ‘I Love Muhammad’ movement? | Explained
content: How did the protests spread to other cities and States? How have Muslim bodies and political parties reacted?

title: State government intends to Tamil Nadu a quality capital: TRB Rajaa
content: Mr. Rajaa said Tamil Nadu has doubled its exports to $52 billion from $26 billion in the last four years, with $14.6 billion coming from electronics.

title: Supreme Court overturns death sentence of Chennai man accused for rape and murder
content: The Chengalpattu Sessions Court sentenced him to death on February 19, 2018, and the Madras High Court upheld it on July 10, 2018

title: India’s invasive aliens problem complicates wait to understand scope
content: Conservation researchers, practitioners, and policymakers in India face a dilemma. As one scientist put it: should they wait to document the effects of all these species to prepare a conservation plan or should they document and conserve in parallel?

title: Trinamool takes fight to Tripura: Delegation visits Agartala party office ‘vandalised by BJP’
content: Delegation stranded at Agartala airport after convoy allegedly held back; West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee accuses ‘double-engine BJP government’ in Tripura of restraining their movement

title: Rakesh Kishore, a septuagenarian lawyer who is ‘unknown’ in legal circle and ‘invisible’ in society
content: He praises the Yogi government’s ‘bulldozer action’ against Muslims in Bareilly, calling it ‘the only way to deliver justice in present times’

title: Tourism takes a hit as the hills of north Bengal reel under the aftermath of floods
content: Hospitality industry members say the tourism industry in the hills lost close to 50 crore in the three days after the floods

title: The Hindu set to host property expo in Singapore on October 11, 12
content: The expo aims to bring together top developers, luxury property brands, and industry experts under one roof

title: Six workers, proprietor killed in explosion at firecracker unit in Konaseema district of A.P.
content: A short circuit in the electrical wiring system at the unit reportedly led to the accident; three more workers with 90% of burn injuries battle for life

title: Google’s subsidiary Raiden Infotech to set up ₹87,520-crore data centre in Vizag
content: State Investment Promotion Board approves investment proposals worth ₹1.14 lakh crore, with a potential of createing employment for 67,000 people

title: YSRCP, TDP clash at VMC meet on social welfare pensions
content: YSRCP corporators allege no new pensions have been sanctioned since the NDA government took charge; council also discusses diarrhoea outbreak and civic works in Vijayawada.

title: Andhra Pradesh government ready to resolve teachers’ issues, says  Lokesh
content: Teachers thank the HRD Minister for smooth inter-district transfers and long-awaited promotions; he urges them to focus on students’ performance

title: Neriamangalam-Valara stretch is on revenue land, says govt. affidavit
content: The Kerala High Court had earlier restricted widening works on the stretch following the govt.’s previous affidavit, stating that the road was on reserve forest land

title: W.B. Governor meets President says law and order in the State is being strangulated
content: Speaking to media persons in Delhi, Dr. Bose evaded questions on the imposition of President Rule under Article 356 in West Bengal. However, the Governor added the Constitution of India has enough provisions to deal with the situation

title: Ecuador President unharmed in attack on motorcade
content: President Daniel Noboa was inaugurating a water treatment plant in central Ecuador when his motorcade was set on by a large group protesting against rising fuel prices

title: APHERMC fines Mohan Babu University ₹15 Lakh, recommends withdrawal of recognition
content: University told to refund ₹26.17 crore collected from students between 2022-23 to September 30, 2024 within 15 days; Pro-Chancellor Vishnu Manchu calls findings by Commission panel mere recommendations

title: NHL season preview: X factors and predictions for all 32 teams
content: opening night of the 2025-26 NHL season is Tuesday . this preview will serve you all the key intel you need on all 32 teams, including strengths, weaknesses, X factors, most likely award winners, fantasy tips and a bold prediction .

title: Best time to invest, innovate and make in India: PM Modi
content: Karwa Chauth 2025: Bollywood divas approved lehenga looks for the festival Shakha Pola designs for Bengali women 10 beetroot benefits and kidney-safe ways to eat it Aishwarya Rai Bachchan’s most iconic dance looks through the years Rashmika Madanna stuns with her ethnic elegance The influence of moon on hair growth: Myth or magic? 7 easy livebearing freshwater fish for beginners: Perfect for home aquariums The rainbow of the wild: 10 colourful and rare insects across the globe From Neeru Bajwa to Shehnaaz Gill: Leading ladies shaping Punjabi cinema’s bright future In pics: Vijay Sethupathi’s fierce avatar in Bigg Boss Tamil 9 promo Determine the monthly installment amount for a loan Estimate the returns on investments made through SIPs Find out maturity amount and interest earned on PPF Check maturity amount and interest earned on an FD Estimate the pension amount and corpus accumulated under NPS A Mutual Fund Calculator helps estimate the future value of investments

title: “Shiv Sena (UBT) protests against Mahayuti govt aid package for farmers, calls it “misleading”
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) allies Congress and NCP (SP) also called the relief package “hollow” and asked for something “substantial”

title: Eight injured in scooter explosion in Kanpur market, illegal firecrackers recovered
content: Preliminary investigations have revealed that firecrackers were being illegally stored and sold in the area

title: Fire breaks out at playschool building near Katpadi
content: Police said that a playschool is run on the ground floor of the building, whereas a real estate office is located on the first floor.

title: Work to convert overhead power lines into underground cables around temple nears completion
content: Officials of Tangedco, which executes the work, say that it has been a traditional practice to enforce regular power cuts to houses on key stretches around the temple during festival season to prevent any untoward incidents like electrocution of pilgrims during their visit to the temple.

title: Brief spell of heavy rain throws life out of gear in Vijayawada
content: City receives around 40 mm rain in the evening; commuters, including students, have tough time getting rides

title: Ayodhya represents India’s cultural soul, says Nirmala Sitharaman
content: Union Finance Minister and Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath unveil statues of South Indian music saints

title: Multiple FIRs registered in Punjab on objectionable social media content targeting CJI
content: Social media content relating to attacks on a Constitutional authority, caste-based vilification and incitement, and unjustly exploiting caste and communal sentiments were flagged

title: Two soldiers go missing in Chenab Valley snowstorm during anti-terror operation
content: The operation to trace the missing soldiers is underway on both flanks of the mountains, from the Kishtwar side in the Jammu division and the Kokernag side in the Kashmir division, officials said

title: Odisha to restore Rabindranath Tagore’s residence in Puri
content: The seaside home narrowly escaped demolition by the Puri Municipality after a campaign to preserve it; the property will now be converted into a museum

title: Election Commission to facilitate elderly, PwD, and service voters to vote using postal ballot in Bihar Assembly polls
content: The electors on essential services on the date of poll can apply for the postal ballot facility through the designated nodal officer of their respective department

title: Congress meet clears 25 candidates for Bihar elections amid seat-sharing talks with RJD
content: The cleared candidates are for seats in traditional Congress strongholds and will be announced after consultation with alliance partners, say party’s Bihar leaders; insist there is no fight for seats within alliance

title: British Airways to launch third daily London-Delhi flight in 2026, boosting U.K.-India trade amid PM Starmer’s visit
content: IndiGo to enhance connectivity to Manchester with flights from New Delhi from November 15 in addition to thrice weekly flights from Mumbai

title: Draft labour policy unites social security schemes
content: It aims at creating universal, portable social security accounts for all workers by 2030; it also seeks to raise women’s labour participation to 35%, offer single-window digital compliance for MSMEs

title: ED cracks down on fake summons scam with new QR code verification system
content: Multiple instances have come to the notice of the ED wherein certain ‘unscrupulous’ persons have sent summonses to individuals with the motive of cheating or extortion

title: JMM leaders meet Tejashwi demanding seven seats; RJD offers two
content: According to JMM sources, the party wants to contest in Chakai, Banka, Katoria, Tarapur, Purnea, Manihari, and Dhamdhaha Assembly seats

title: After delays, IAF set to receive first Tejas Mk1A fighter jet
content: HAL’s contract to deliver 83 Tejas Mk1A aircraft has faced delays primarily due to slow engine deliveries

title: Congress, BJP protests demanding Vasavan and Prasanth’s resignation over Sabarimala temple gold-plating roil Kerala
content: Congress’ disruption of the Assembly over  Sabarimala temple gold-plating row spilt onto the street at Mavelikara in Alappuzha and Kannur. BJP workers take out march to Chief Minister’s official residence aeeking CBI enquiry

title: WHO seeks clarification from India if cough syrup has been exported to other countries
content: Official says that the need for global medical product alert will be investigated only after receiving a response from Indian health authorities

title: India to promote solar pumps scheme in Africa, island nations
content: The International Solar Alliance platform will be used to showcase both the PM-KUSUM and the PM Surya Ghar, Minister for Renewable Energy Pralhad Joshi said

title: Address problems of SC community in Bihar manifesto, confederation tells parties
content: Scheduled Caste community in Bihar continue to be marginalised despite forming nearly one-fifth of the State’s population, says report

title: IISc, IIT-M join forces with GBA for World Bank-funded water security and resilience project
content: A GBA source involved in the project says the civic authority aims not only to mitigate flooding caused by poor stormwater drain infrastructure but also to improve overall water security in the city

title: Tamil Nadu says it will take ‘criminal action’ against cough syrup-maker
content: Ma. Subramanian says the Drug Control Department of Madhya Pradesh sent a letter to Tamil Nadu on October 1 following the death of children due to two syrups suspected to have been contaminated. Since the manufacturer of one of the syrups was from Tamil Nadu, the government banned its sale across the State

title: Jitan Ram Manjhi, Chirag Paswan post cryptic messages on social media, signal unease in NDA seat-sharing talks
content: Leaders invoke poetry and legacy to press the BJP for a “respectable” share of seats in the upcoming Bihar Assembly elections
